articles.author: JAMIE STENGLE
articles.title: Boy Scouts is changing its name to Scouting America - The Associated Press
articles.description: The Boy Scouts of America is changing its name for the first time in its 114-year history. The Texas-based organization announced Tuesday that it would become Scouting America. It's a significant shift for the organization as it emerges from bankruptcy after …
articles.content: IRVING, Texas (AP) The Boy Scouts of America is changing its name for the first time in its 114-year history and will become Scouting America. Its a significant shift as the organization emerges from… [+4255 chars]
